heading: Othello
caption: A web application for playing Othello against a neural network opponent.

heading: Discussion Activity & Competition Success
caption: A prize-winning entry into the Meta Kaggle Hackathon, analysing the forum behaviour of top competitors.

heading: The Venn Challenge
caption: An AI-collaborative programming competition I ran at university with some friends.

heading: Networked Cube
caption: A light-hearted networking exercise with a puzzle cube theme.

heading: Metaheuristic Aligner (MAli)
caption: A Multiple Sequence Alignment (MSA) tool I developed for my Honours project at university.

heading: Simulated Annealing
caption: An interactive demonstration of Simulated Annealing, a stochastic optimization algorithm.

heading: Patterns
caption: Board game themed interactive examples for six of my favourite 'Gang of Four' design patterns.

heading: Birthday Tracker
caption: A simple Android app for tracking upcoming birthdays.

heading: Boggle
caption: The classic word-finding game, implemented as a WPF application using the MVVM architecture pattern.

heading: Chess
caption: An implementation of chess as a static web app.

heading: Tempo Tapper
caption: A Chrome extension for finding the tempo of music, in beats per minute.

heading: Minesweeper
caption: A minimalist Minesweeper game using WPF.

heading: Tic-Tac-Toe
caption: Tic-Tac-Toe game logic and CPU opponents, with front ends in WPF, WinForms and .NET MAUI.
